definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: You can make tea with jujubes, too.
Dates showered down when we shook the tree.
sentences.chinese: 我们摇树时，枣子纷纷落下。

sentences.english: A sucker from the jujube yields tiny sour fruits.
sentences.chinese: 一枝侧枝长出许多小又酸的枣子。

sentences.english: They call for dates and quinces in the pastry.
sentences.chinese: 点心房里在喊着要枣子和温柏呢。

sentences.english: Therefore, he sold the sheep, bought some Jujubes, starting a shipment.
sentences.chinese: 于是，他卖掉了羊群，买了些枣子，装船出发了。

sentences.english: Both large and red dates Jiaoren met with vertical extension of three feet.
sentences.chinese: 既大又红的枣子叫人见了垂延三尺。

sentences.english: Zizyphus jujuba of Yiwu is one of fine species of jujube in our country.
sentences.chinese: 义乌大枣是我国优良枣子品种之一。

definition: blue or green jujube/Chinese green date
a variety of orange grown in Guangdong, Sichuan, Taiwan etc
